long_description: The Saucony Hurricane 15 road-running shoes supply responsive cushioning and control, making them an ideal stability shoe for the everyday runner. Lightweight, highly breathable nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic leather overlays and thermoplastic urethane overlays for structure and durability. Nylon linings breathe well, wick moisture and dry quickly to keep your feet cool and comfortable. ComfortLite footbeds enhance comfort. Full-length dual-density EVA PowerGrid(TM) unit centers the foot, absorbs impacts and distributes pressure for an extremely comfortable ride. Medial posts offer additional support and stability; SRC(TM) Super Rebound Compound provides shock absorption in the heels to help smooth transition to midfoot. Lightweight blown rubber outsoles on the Saucony Hurricane 15 road-running shoes add cushioning, flex easily and maintain durability for a smooth ride. The Saucony Hurricane 15 road-running shoes feature an 8mm offset (26mm heel and 18mm forefoot).
